languages.text: {n}Сквозь нагромождения камней, земли и густой пыли вам удается рассмотреть вырванные из пазов и валяющиеся на полу крепежные элементы. Подобные используются для фиксации промышленных опор, использующихся в крупных мануфакторумах Империума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сквозь нагромождения камней, земли и густой пыли вам удается рассмотреть вырванные из пазов и валяющиеся на полу крепежные элементы. Подобные используются для фиксации промышленных опор, использующихся в крупных мануфакторумах Империума.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь нагромождения камней, земли и густой пыли вам удается рассмотреть вырванные из пазов и валяющиеся на полу крепежные элементы. Подобные используются для фиксации промышленных опор, использующихся в крупных мануфакторумах Империума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you're able to glance parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

{n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you're able to glance parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

{n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you're able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

{n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

{n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}透过周围堆积的岩石、泥土与厚厚的灰尘，你看到某种地面固定装置被扯了下来，插销被随意地丢在地上。像这样的地面固定装置，通常都是用来固定帝国大型制造工厂的工业钢梁的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}透过周围堆积的岩石、泥土与厚厚的灰尘，你看到某种地面固定装置被扯了下来，插销被随意地丢在地上。像这样的地面固定装置，通常都是用来固定帝国大型制造工厂的工业钢梁的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durch den Haufen aus Stein, Schutt und dickem Staub kannst du Beschläge erkennen, die aus der Verankerung gerissen und zu Boden geworfen wurden. Solche Bauteile werden im gesamten Imperium verwendet, um in großen Manufactorien industrielle Träger zu befestigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch den Haufen aus Stein, Schutt und dickem Staub kannst du Beschläge erkennen, die aus der Verankerung gerissen und zu Boden geworfen wurden. Solche Bauteile werden im gesamten Imperium verwendet, um in großen Manufactorien industrielle Träger zu befestigen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A través del montón de rocas, tierra y polvo, distingues varios herrajes que han sido arrancados de cuajo y arrojados al suelo. Se parecen a las piezas que se utilizan para afianzar vigas industriales en los manufactorums del Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A través del montón de rocas, tierra y polvo, distingues varios herrajes que han sido arrancados de cuajo y arrojados al suelo. Se parecen a las piezas que se utilizan para afianzar vigas industriales en los manufactorums del Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous les pierres, la crasse et l'épaisse couche de poussière, vous distinguez des morceaux de mécanismes qui ont été arrachés à leurs emplacements et jetés au sol. Ces éléments servent à maintenir les poutres industrielles en place dans les grands manufactorums de l'Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous les pierres, la crasse et l'épaisse couche de poussière, vous distinguez des morceaux de mécanismes qui ont été arrachés à leurs emplacements et jetés au sol. Ces éléments servent à maintenir les poutres industrielles en place dans les grands manufactorums de l'Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}積み重なった岩や土、厚い埃の中から、ソケットから引きちぎられて床に投げ出された固定具の部品が見て取れる。このような部品は、帝国の周辺の大規模な聖工場で、工業用架台を固定するために使われている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}積み重なった岩や土、厚い埃の中から、ソケットから引きちぎられて床に投げ出された固定具の部品が見て取れる。このような部品は、帝国の周辺の大規模な聖工場で、工業用架台を固定するために使われている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Taş, toprak ve toz yığını arasında, yuvasından sökülüp yere atılmış tesisat parçalarını seçebiliyorsun. Bunlar, büyük İmparatorluk manufaktorumlarındaki endüstriyel kirişleri sabitlemede kullanılan türden parçalar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Through the piled-up rocks, dirt, and thick dust, you are able to make out parts of fixtures that were ripped out of their sockets and thrown to the floor. Parts like these are used for fastening industrial girders in place at large manufactorums around the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Taş, toprak ve toz yığını arasında, yuvasından sökülüp yere atılmış tesisat parçalarını seçebiliyorsun. Bunlar, büyük İmparatorluk manufaktorumlarındaki endüstriyel kirişleri sabitlemede kullanılan türden parçalar.{/n}
